sqlMap.select: SELECT A.CC_NM ccNm , A.CC_CONTENT ccContent , A.CC_DATE ccDate , A.CC_TYPE ccType , A.CB_NM cbNm , B.USER_NICKNAME ccWriter FROM COMMUNITY_COMMENT A INNER JOIN TB_USER B ON(A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID) WHERE A.CC_NM = #cbNm# ORDER BY 1 DESC
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO COMMUNITY_COMMENT( CC_NM , CC_CONTENT , CC_DATE , CC_TYPE , CB_NM , USER_ID ) VALUES ( QNA_BOARD_COMMENT_SEQ.NEXTVAL , #ccContent# , SYSDATE , 'N' , #cbNm# , #ccWriter# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE COMMUNITY_COMMENT SET CC_CONTENT = #ccContent# CC_DATE = SYSDATE CC_TYPE = #ccType# WHERE CC_NM = #ccNm# AND CB_NM = #cbNm#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM COMMUNITY_COMMENT WHERE CC_NM = #ccNm# AND CB_NM = #cbNm#
